para.text: In this subchapter, payment or delivery of property is made in good faith if a holder:
Had a reasonable basis for believing, based on the facts then known, that the property was required or permitted to be paid or delivered to the Administrator under this chapter; or
In response to a demand by the Administrator or Administrator's agent; or
Under a guidance or ruling issued by the Administrator which the holder reasonably believed required or permitted the property to be paid or delivered.
